Articles.Content:
I actually came close to that, but I overcame it in February. And now here's the obsession.

What if people liked repetition? Then I could keep reposting those GIFs.

Everyone dies.

What if everyone would not harass us bronies on websites like 4chan?

The world would... be a better place? Nah, nuclear war sounds 'bout right.

What if Lundmunchkins decided that Gallifrey was not his location?

I would change it to Equestria.

What if General Rarity REALLY WAS a pony, who is disguised as a human?

That's true?

What if I'm a shapeshifting alien reptile?

Nobody would know!

What if what if?

Edited July 30, 2014 by Lundmunchkins
What if Lundmunchkins actually posted a question on his last post before he edits it?
What if you had put an answer in that?

Then Sun would be booted out of the thread for not making an answer in that post.

What if humans reached superluminal travel technology?

Then they would most likely become a interstellar empire, making friendships and enemies with aliens when necessary.

What if the Grox are actually Humanity in the distant future?

Then they would most likely become a interstellar empire, making friendships and enemies with aliens when necessary.

What if the Grox are actually Humanity in the distant future?

Then you could seduce them with pictures of fluffy kittens.

What if the US government redirected 1% of DoD's budget to the space program?

Then we would be on mars by now and would not have cancelled the shuttle program and would have bought spaceX.

What if Sun and General Rarity stopped posting directly after one another so much?

The forums would be better.

What if sentient pickles ruled the world?

fyreflare would be so super.

what if it whas if ? (beware of this one xD)

EVERYONE DIES.

What if I'm not real?

Well, i'd like to know what I'm taking.

What if we all could run 75 kph but don't know how?

Then you couldn't have made that comment.

What if beaches had 6 million more tons of dirt, and over 100 people a day were in this situation?:
it could turn once more like this:
What if you had asked a question in that?

ref. shadock said once upon a time: "when there no answer that mean there no question." (that an aproximative phoenetic anagramme translation from french and could applies to many languages ref. baby lone)

IDK what you just said.

What if everyone played Angry Birds?

They would lose interest soon after.

What if this thread didn't exist?

Then you couldn't have made that comment.

What if KSP was sold to Valve?

Then we would never get v. 0.3.0
